body.name: RADIUS Flex Brush BPA Free & ADA Accepted Toothbrush Designed to Improve Gum Health & Reduce Gum Issues - Right Hand - Purple/Watermelon/Mint Green - Pack of 3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 1 min
features: SUPERSIZED BRUSH HEAD FOR SUPERIOR CLEANING - The wide oval brush head coupled with a flexible neck helps target those tricky to reach areas more easily, massaging the whole mouth as it goes for an all over tingly clean.

3X LONGER LASTING BRISTLES - Made from vegetable based nylon bristles (which in case you're wondering are BPA-free, ADA accepted) the Flex Brush lasts 3X longer than other run of the mill toothbrushes.

FLEX NECK TECHNOLOGY - The Flex Brush’s wide soft head stems from an angled neck reduces pressure on gums and teeth. Especially if you're a hard brusher. Bristles are softer and more uniquely aligned providing even pressure that reduces chronic issues.

AWARD WINNING "EASY-GRIP" DESIGN - The RADIUS Flex Brush user friendly handle complies with recommended 45 degree brush to tooth angle and the smart Thumb and Palm design makes it much easier to grip and control.
ADA ACCEPTED - Accepted by the American Dental Association. All RADIUS Toothbrushes are a must have for clean teeth & gums.
body.description: RADIUS FLEX BRUSH - The one that started it all. The luxurious RADIUS Original blends form and function seamlessly. Not only is it accepted by the American Dental Association for prevention of gingivitis and the removal of plaque. The RADIUS Original’s iconic design won it a spot in the permanent collection of the Smithsonian Institute National Design Museum.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made with the planet in Mind From the recycled rubber handle to the vegetable-based nylon bristles, the Radius Flex Brush is friendly from the top to bottom. Award-Winning Easy-Grip User-friendly handle dentists recommend and a smart thumb-and-palm design that's easy to grip and control. Good for Lefties, Too! This flexible grip comes in right and left-handed versions and tons of colors for luxurious teeth cleaning experience that fits YOU.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: a little expensive but its the only toothbrush I've been back to the past 5 years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush ever
reviews.reviewText: 50 years of using Radius, even when it was hard to find. Now, with arthritis in right hand, it is very comfortable. Teeth are plaque free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't let the size scare you
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down the best toothbrush on the market. I've been using Radius for over 20 years and have NEVER had a cavity and minimal tartar buildup between dental visits. Get this and you'll never go back to a regular toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winner of the unofficial toothbrush shoot-out of 2016
reviews.reviewText: I was stuck in a hotel over a lonely weekend on a business trip in a dead city and out of sheer boredom went to a local pharmacy and bought a whole bunch of toothbrushes of different styles to find out what one is "best". Yes, this is how I sometimes spend my weekends when traveling alone to Godforsaken places.I had never seen these before but wow, it was the clear winner in the end. It felt funky at first with the large head size and thick handle but it was actually very ergonomic and easy in the hand. This was the absolutely winner in the "my teeth feel clean" contest and when I'm on the road, these are the only kind I use. They are soft but long-lasting, come in a variety of colors and seem to be more effective and really brushing your teeth to the finest.I haven't seen them in too many retail outlets and when I shout out my job when I do I get a lot of eye-rolling from others but give it a try, it's not a big investment and it's a fantastic toothbrush you will use every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I paid the extra money. These do the teeth and gums at the same time. The handle makes it easy to do front and back. Like the brush should be 1/2 the price. Monumental mark up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't use regular toothbrushes anymore
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this toothbrush. Now, a regular brush feels like i'm using a qtip to brush. The size takes a little bit of getting used to but everyone that I've convinced to try it has become a user. I can't recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best toothbrushes on the market
reviews.reviewText: These are the best toothbrushes on the market. They are wide enough to not only clean your teeth but massage your gums at the same time. Also because of the width they hold their shape and do not need to be replaced near as often. The bristles are flexible enough to thoroughly cover each tooth and not feel rough on your gum area. Rather than throw them away when they have reached their peak usage, I soak them in peroxide and they are just like new. My whole mouth feels tingly clean. Then when I am ready to replace it after about one year I use them for cleaning shower stall tracking and window sill tracking. Also because you can purchase for left or right handed brushing they are very easy to use and twist for the right positioning in your whole mouth. Really I can't say enough good things about these toothbrushes. I'd never go back again to the old style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these toothbrushes for about 20 years now. I would have a hard time if I had to go back to using "regular" toothbrushes.They last much longer than other toothbrushes and just make my mouth feel so much cleaner and fresher because you're brushing your gums along with your teeth. :) The bristles are nice and soft so they don't make your gums bleed but not too soft that they don't brush your teeth well.I used to use the original ones but now only get the Scuba because the grip is better when your hand is wet.I'd definitely recommend these toothbrushes to everyone!! You won't be disappointed!They are pricier than the toothbrushes you get at your local store but really, you'd probably have to replace those 3 times before you'd have to replace one of these so there really is no price difference.
Estupendo cepillo, lo uso hace años, buena compra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These arrived very quickly. They are a bit pricey but a great product. Husband prefers these above any others on the market, including the electric ones!
Have used for many years alongside my electric toothbrush. Well made,flexible enough to prevent using too much force, and great for cleaning teeth ! Expensive but worth it. Highly recommended.
Adoro questi spazzolini sono super resistenti e garantiscono una pulizia perfetta. In più a u ottimo prezzo. La consegna addirittura in anticipo
